DOC.brief_summary: This study longitudinal follow-up 670 primarily African-American woman 17-year-old firstborn child enrol since 1990 highly significant randomize control trial ( RCT ) prenatal infancy home visiting nurse . Nurses program charge improve pregnancy outcome , child health development , maternal economic self-sufficiency . This follow-up examines whether early program effect maternal child function lead le violent antisocial behavior , psychopathology , substance use use-disorders , risk HIV ; whether effect great genetic environmental risk ; whether program effect replicate find white earlier trial .
